metadata.Title: CVE-2023-47235 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in FRRouting FRR through 9.0.1. A crash can occur when a malformed BGP UPDATE message with an EOR is processed, because the presence of EOR does not lead to a treat-as-withdraw outcome.

notes.Note: sbeattie> the quagga project was renamed to frr mdeslaur> The code in quagga is different, there is no indication quagga is vulnerable to this issue, marking as not-affected for now

criterions.comment: frr package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
